original: Atlestam, Per-Olof, fil. dr, Göteborg, f. 22/1/12 i Gbg av folksk :lär. Mårten V. o. E&ter Nilsson f. Edman. G. 38 m. fil. kand. Ulla Söderhjelm. Barn: Ulf f. 39, Barbro 39, Margaretha 40, Ingrid 44. — Stud :ex. 31, fil. kand. 34, fil. lic. 38, fil. dr 42, fil. mag. 45, allt i Gbg, provår 46. Aman. v. Gbgs högsk. geogr. inst. 36-41, div. lär:föroTdn. i Gbg o. Borås 35-44, lär. v. Gbgs prakt, mellansk. 44-47. Skr.: Bohusläns ljunghedar. En geogr. studie (grad:avh. 42), samt ett antal smärre skr. av geogr., biol. o. arkeolog. inneh.
translated:
Atlestam, Per-Olof, PhD, Gothenburg, born January 22, 1912 in Gothenburg, son of a primary school teacher named Mårten V. and Ester Nilsson f. Edman. Married in 1938 to Ulla Söderhjelm, who holds a Bachelor's degree. Children: Ulf born in 1939, Barbro born in 1939, Margaretha born in 1940, Ingrid born in 1944. 

Education: Passed matriculation exam in 1931, Bachelor of Arts degree in 1934, PhD in 1942, all from Gothenburg. Additionally, earned a Master's degree in 1945, and completed a probationary year in 1946. 

Career: Assistant at the Gothenburg University Geographical Institute from 1936-1941, various teaching positions in Gothenburg and Borås from 1935-1944, and teacher at Gothenburg Practical Intermediate School from 1944-1947. Published a geography thesis entitled "Bohuslän's Heather Moorlands: A Study in Geography" in 1942, as well as several smaller works on geography, biology, and archaeology.

structured.name: Per-Olof Atlestam
structured.description: Swedish geographer and author of 'Bohuslän's Heather Moorlands: A Study in Geography' (1942) and several smaller works on geography, biology, and archaeology.
